sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Elisha his lamentation, upon the suddain translation of Elijah. Opened in a sermon at the funeral of Mr. VVilliam Strong, that eminently faithful servant and minister of Christ. By Obadiah Sedgwick, B.D. and preacher of the Gospel in Covent Garden. Sedgwick, Obadiah, 1600?-1658.
[8], 30 p.
Printed by R.W. for Francis Tyton, at the sign of the three Daggers in Fleet-street, near the Inner-Temple Gate., London, : 1654.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "July. 7". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[8], 30 p.
Printed by R.W. for Francis Tyton, at the sign of the three Daggers in Fleet-street, near the Inner-Temple Gate., London, : 1654.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "July. 7". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Francis Tyton

the sign of the three Daggers in Fleet-street, near the Inner-Temple Gate.
